channel.title: Projects on Manuel Mane Penton
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Manuel Mane Penton

item.title: Football Database Analysis
item.description: Github Link In this project I analyze the most popular European Football leagues and their teams and players. For this purpose, I use a SQLite database from Kaggle and apply exploratory data analysis using SQLite in order to extract insights. This analysis is entirely done in Jupyter Notebooks. The database is composed by 199 columns and more than 1000k rows distributed in 7 different tables. Purpose The main question I answer through this analysis is what attributes or playstyle contribute more to the victory of a team?

item.title: Twitter WeRateDogs Data Analysis
item.description: Github Link This project is part of the Data Wrangling Lesson of Udacity Data Analyst Nanodegree Program. Data Wrangling is a core skills that everyone who works with data should be familiar since data real world data rarely comes clean. In this project I use and apply Python libraries to gather data from a variety of sources and in variety of formats, assess its quality and tidiness, and then clean it.

item.title: Domestic Flights Delay
item.description: GitHub Link This project is part of the Data Visualization Lesson of Udacity Data Analyst Nanodegree Program. Data Visualization is an important and core skill in the data analysis process. In this project I perform both Exploratory and Explanatory Visualization Analysis on the Domestic Flight On-time arrival data from the Bureau of Transportation Statistic Website. This dataset consisted of 285 159 observations per month, year, carrier, and airports of arrival domestic flights.
